ur-dwarf

Destiny Playbook

You are the platonic ideal of what it means to be a Dwarf. All of dwarven-kind will remember you, until history itself is gone.

Requirements

To become the Ur-Dwarf, you must earn the Fellowship of the Dwarves.

The Ur-Dwarf starts with Mountain Stance.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.the-ur-dwarf.Item.pxmSNmuS7R0utidC]{Mountain stance}

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Take the Dwarven Core Moves (Clear The Path, People of Stone, and Unbreakable. If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Dwarven Custom.
  • Take an Ur-Dwarf Custom.
  • Take an Ur-Dwarf Custom.
  • Take an Ur-Dwarf Custom.
